attributes.action: To not give money and participate in the Eurovison song contest 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the last decade the eastern european block has started to dominate the Eurovision song contest. The UK are paying huge amounts to this competition and i see this as a waste because it is not appreciated as the Eastern european countries vote politically and for there neighbours. The competition is becoming more and more pointless therefore we should pull out and leave them to deal with the costs as they see it as there competition.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
